name: Rose Milk
description: A refreshing, rose-flavored Indian cool drink, perfect for quenching your thirst.
directions: Pour cold milk and rose syrup into a pitcher or jug.
Stir the rose syrup thoroughly with a spoon until it completely blends with the milk.
If you prefer it sweeter, you can add sugar, but it's entirely optional.
Keep stirring until the sugar dissolves completely.
In a serving glass, place a couple of ice cubes and then gently pour the rose-infused milk into the glass
Finally, top it off with a touch of dried rose petals or some dry fruits, and savor this revitalizing rose milk.
